title: Beefree
description:
Beefree is the go-to HTML email builder that converts. Speed up our email production with the user-friendly drag-and-drop editor and effortlessly export emails to any sending platform with just a few clicks. 

Key Benefits:
Get inspired with our 1500+ templates
Set up your brand and manage your designs in one place
Effortlessly collaborate across department, teams, and with clients
Intergrate with your favorite ESPs and Marketing platforms.
Easily design beautiful emails that convert.
